text: Please fix all existing type errors (by actually fixing them and improving typing, NOT by ignoring them or disabling typing)

proposedTasks.title: Fix all TypeScript type errors in the backend
proposedTasks.description: Audit and fix every TypeScript type error in the backend codebase (`packages/backend` or equivalent). For each error: add correct types, replace `any` with proper interfaces/types, fix incorrect type assertions, and ensure strict-mode compliance. Do NOT suppress errors with `@ts-ignore`, `@ts-expect-error`, `as any`, or by loosening `tsconfig` strictness. Acceptance criteria: `tsc --noEmit` on the backend produces zero errors.

proposedTasks.title: Fix all TypeScript type errors in the frontend
proposedTasks.description: Audit and fix every TypeScript type error in the frontend codebase (`packages/frontend` or equivalent). For each error: add correct types to props, state, event handlers, and API responses; replace `any` with proper interfaces/types; fix incorrect type assertions. Do NOT suppress errors with `@ts-ignore`, `@ts-expect-error`, `as any`, or by loosening `tsconfig` strictness. Acceptance criteria: `tsc --noEmit` on the frontend produces zero errors.

taskTitles: Fix all TypeScript type errors in the backend
Fix all TypeScript type errors in the frontend
